03_001.title: Solar Panel
03_001.short_description: A device that converts sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic cells, commonly used for renewable energy generation in homes, businesses, and remote locations

03_002.title: Solar Light
03_002.short_description: Energy-efficient lighting powered by solar panels, converting sunlight into electricity for outdoor or indoor illumination, with no need for external power sources

03_003.title: Solar Battery
03_003.short_description: A storage device that collects and stores energy from solar panels, providing reliable power during night or cloudy conditions, enhancing energy efficiency and independence.
